alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 4:13PM MST until February 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Fall River County Plains, Jackson County, Oglala Lakota County and the Southern Foot Hills. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Southern Foot Hills
